name: Sales Register
query:
SELECT
    name AS "Invoice No:Link/Invoice:140",
    posting_date AS "Date:Date:100",
    customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:180",
    total AS "Total:Currency:120",
    total_tax AS "Tax:Currency:120",
    net_total AS "Net Total:Currency:130",
    paid_amount AS "Paid:Currency:120",
    outstanding_amount AS "Outstanding:Currency:130",
    status AS "Status:Data:120"
FROM `tabInvoice`
WHERE docstatus = 1
  AND posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
ORDER BY posting_date DESC;
